sentence.Network_en: He acted as a frontman for a drugs cartel.
sentence.Network_cn: 他给一个毒品集团当掩护。

sentence.Network_en: Since 1993 OPEC, the oil cartel dominated by Saudi Arabia, has kept its output constant at around 25m barrels a day.
sentence.Network_cn: 自1993年以来，由沙特阿拉伯主导的石油输出国组织欧佩克就一直将石油产量控制在每天2,500万桶左右。

sentence.Network_en: Cartel members may defect by behaving competitively.
sentence.Network_cn: 卡特尔的成员国由于进行竞争而会出现背叛.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 卡特尔(Cartel)是指生产同类商品的企业，为了获取高额利润，在划分市场、规定商品产量、确定商品价格等一个或几个方面达成协议 …
采矿专业词汇单词表 - 豆丁网 ... car dump 卸煤设备 cartel 企业联合，卡特尔 cave in 冒顶，垮落.
寡占厂商联合成为一个形同独占的组织， 从整个产业的角度决定产量与价格；这种组织称之为卡泰尔（cartel ）。 隐形的结合行 …
垄断利益集团、垄断联盟、企业联合、同业联盟(Cartel)也称卡特尔,是垄断组织的一种表现形式,是由一系列生产类似产品的企业组成的联盟 [1] ,通过某些协议或规定来.

list.exp: 制造与贩卖毒品的团伙
list.abs: doctor 医生drug cartel 制造与贩卖毒品的团伙drug ring 毒品买卖集团
2012年7月18日 -  原文消息称:中国维生素C制造商辩称,维生素C的价格是由中国政府制定的,这就意味着维生素C的价格卡特尔(Price Cartel)是否应被看作是政府行为而得到豁免.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from German Kartell, from French cartel, from Italian cartello, diminutive of carta, from Latin carta (see card). It was originally used to refer to the coalition of the Conservatives and National Liberal parties in Germany (1887), and hence any political combination; later to denote a trade agreement (early 20th cent.)

entry.def: A cartel is an association of similar companies or businesses that have grouped together in order to prevent competition and to control prices.

example.ex: Since 1993 OPEC, the oil cartel dominated by Saudi Arabia, has kept its output constant at around 25m barrels a day.
example.tran: 自1993年以来,由沙特阿拉伯主导的石油输出国组织欧佩克就一直将石油产量控制在每天2,500万桶左右。

means.word_mean: 1. a consortium of independent organizations formed to limit competition by controlling the production and distribution of a product or service;

sentences.sentence: "they set up the trust in the hope of gaining a monopoly"
